name: Cat Shoot Ball - Bubble Fruit
description:
Start an exciting journey in the magical world! Aim, shoot and burst fruit bubbles together with an adorable hero cat. Amazing levels will give you incredible emotions. Play together with friends, earn the best scores and get to the top!
Cat Shoot Ball - Bubble Fruit FEATURES:
- 400+ levels with uniquely obstacles
- Awesome special bubbles: chilli, pomegranate and other
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
- Fruity graphics & animations
